Ancient Spear.name: Ancient Spear
Ancient Spear.description: An ancient wooden spear of simple design. Time has taken its toll on this weapon.

Ancient Sword.name: Ancient Sword
Ancient Sword.description: A straight blade of ancient origin. The grip is covered with strange ornamentations, which may make it valuable to historians and other scholarly-minded individuals.

Antler Cleaver.name: Antler Cleaver
Antler Cleaver.description: A very crude cleaver crafted from a sharpened antler. Heavy and blunt, but still dangerous.

Arming Sword.name: Arming Sword
Arming Sword.description: A lightweight, straight sword suitable for slashing, thrusting and swinging.

Axehammer.name: Axehammer
Axehammer.description: A massive, rusty hybrid of hammer and axe. Due to its blunt edge more of the former than the latter.

Bardiche.name: Bardiche
Bardiche.description: A large axe with a long head that can be brought down on the enemy with devastating effect.

Battle Whip.name: Battle Whip
Battle Whip.description: A long whip with a barbed tip that can tear terrible bleeding wounds over significant range, but is very ineffective against armor.

Billhook.name: Billhook
Billhook.description: A pike-like weapon with a blade for striking over some distance and a hook attached for pulling in targets.

Ancient Bladed Pike.name: Ancient Bladed Pike
Ancient Bladed Pike.description: A long, ancient pike used to attack over some distance and keeping the enemy at bay.

Bludgeon.name: Bludgeon
Bludgeon.description: A spiked metal head on a wooden shaft, crude but effective in bashing in heads.

Blunt Cleaver.name: Blunt Cleaver
Blunt Cleaver.description: This blunt cleaver is heavy and blunt, but can still cause terrible wounds.

Boar Spear.name: Boar Spear
Boar Spear.description: A short and heavy spear with two wings behind the bladed tip.

Broken Ancient Sword.name: Broken Ancient Sword
Broken Ancient Sword.description: An ancient sword with a broken blade, severely limiting its reach.

Broken Ancient Bladed Pike.name: Broken Ancient Bladed Pike
Broken Ancient Bladed Pike.description: A bladed pike with a broken tip. Not all weapons stand the test of time. Once used to attack over some distance and keeping the enemy at bay.

Butcher's Cleaver.name: Butcher's Cleaver
Butcher's Cleaver.description: A tool with a thick rectangular blade used for hacking through meat and bone.

Claw Club.name: Claw Club
Claw Club.description: The massive claws of some wild animal are fixed to this large club

Crossbow.name: Crossbow
Crossbow.description: A pull-lever crossbow that can propel bolts over medium distances. Effective even in the hands of laymen, but requires almost a full turn to reload.

Crude Axe.name: Crude Axe
Crude Axe.description: This axe is crudely made, but heavy and jagged.

Crypt Cleaver.name: Crypt Cleaver
Crypt Cleaver.description: A heavy blade with an oddly curved end, combining the qualities of sword and axe into a devastating two-handed cleaver.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: A pointy dagger made for close quarter combat.

Falchion.name: Falchion
Falchion.description: A curved sword best suited for slashing and cutting unarmored opponents.

Falx.name: Falx
Falx.description: A short and heavy blade with a curved edge designed for hacking and ripping bleeding wounds. Dulled over the years.

Fencing Sword.name: Fencing Sword
Fencing Sword.description: A light and elegant blade, favoring a swift and mobile fighting style.

Fighting Axe.name: Fighting Axe
Fighting Axe.description: An axe explicitly designed for fighting armored opponents. Quite sturdy.

Fighting Spear.name: Fighting Spear
Fighting Spear.description: A long and sturdy spear built for battle.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: A separate striking head attached to a handle by a chain. A rather unpredictable weapon, but useful to strike over or around shield cover.

Boondock Bow.name: Boondock Bow
Boondock Bow.description: A very light short bow used by Goblins.

Spiked Impaler.name: Spiked Impaler
Spiked Impaler.description: A large and heavy crossbow with menacing spikes in front. More like a minitature ballista, it shoots stakes with enough force to knock back a target hit.

Cruel Falchion.name: Cruel Falchion
Cruel Falchion.description: A lightweight goblin falchion made for cutting.

Reinforced Boondock Bow.name: Reinforced Boondock Bow
Reinforced Boondock Bow.description: A light, yet powerful bow made from various woods.

Notched Blade.name: Notched Blade
Notched Blade.description: A long curved knife with a one sided blade used for slashing, hacking and stabbing at weak spots.

Jagged Pike.name: Jagged Pike
Jagged Pike.description: A long jagged pike that can tear bleeding wounds and keep enemies at bay with its long reach.

Goblin Skewer.name: Goblin Skewer
Goblin Skewer.description: A long shaft with a sharp metal tip at the top.

Bundle of Spiked Bolas.name: Bundle of Spiked Bolas
Bundle of Spiked Bolas.description: Small and heavy iron balls with metal spikes to be hurled at a target.

Gnarly Staff.name: Gnarly Staff
Gnarly Staff.description: A gnarly staff carved from old and hard wood, adorned with bones and feathers. May be of interest to collectors.

Goedendag.name: Goedendag
Goedendag.description: A metal-reinforced club with a spike at the top. Can be used to thrust at the enemy, or pummel them into submission.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: A heavy and long two-handed axe designed for battle that bears down heavy with every swing and can easily cut a man in two.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: A long two-handed blade as good for crushing as for cutting.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: A one-handed axe with a medium long shaft and a refined head.

Hatchet.name: Hatchet
Hatchet.description: A crude axe with a short shaft and an iron head.

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.description: A heavy crossbow with a crank that can propel bolts over medium distances and is effective even against heavily armored targets. Requires almost a full turn to reload.

Bundle of Heavy Javelins.name: Bundle of Heavy Javelins
Bundle of Heavy Javelins.description: A set of heavy, rugged-looking javelins. Harder to throw and hit with, but more impactful.

Heavy Rusty Axe.name: Heavy Rusty Axe
Heavy Rusty Axe.description: This heavy rusty axe works more by its weight than its sharpness, but it gets the job done nevertheless.

Bundle of Heavy Throwing Axes.name: Bundle of Heavy Throwing Axes
Bundle of Heavy Throwing Axes.description: Heavy and unwieldy throwing axes used by northern barbarians. Difficult to throw and hit with, but deadly.

Hooked Blade.name: Hooked Blade
Hooked Blade.description: An agricultural tool adapted for use in battle, this polearm has a hooked blade for striking over some distance and pulling in targets.

Hunting Bow.name: Hunting Bow
Hunting Bow.description: A refined bow usually used for hunting down animals. Deadly against unarmored targets, but requires some expertise to use effectively.

Bundle of Javelins.name: Bundle of Javelins
Bundle of Javelins.description: A couple of light throwing spears usually carried by skirmishers. Have limited range and are exhausting to throw, but may inflict devastating injuries.

Khopesh.name: Khopesh
Khopesh.description: An ancient curved sword on a long handle with strange ornamentations. Its shape makes it particularly effective against armor.

Knife.name: Knife
Knife.description: A short knife, not made for combat.

Reproach of the Old Gods.name: Reproach of the Old Gods
Reproach of the Old Gods.description: The crepuscular sword bends purples and oranges until it seemingly carries twilight itself in its fuller. Held to the touch, one cannot tell if they are being burned or chilled. Magic or well-crafted, whatever the weapon is it vibrates as though it were fighting off power immense and you need only swing it to find the steel's true charge.

Light Crossbow.name: Light Crossbow
Light Crossbow.description: A lighter variant of a pull-lever crossbow that can propel bolts over medium distances. Effective even in the hands of laymen, but requires almost a full turn to reload.

Longaxe.name: Longaxe
Longaxe.description: A relatively thin blade on a very long shaft used for devastating cutting attacks over some distance, and to render shields unusable from behind the frontline.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A long two-handed blade that makes for a versatile weapon.

Lute.name: Lute
Lute.description: A musical instrument that, if in the right hands, is capable of producing pleasant sounds with its vibrating strings.

Masterwork Bow.name: Masterwork Bow
Masterwork Bow.description: A finely crafted bow, light in grip and perfectly balanced for accuracy. Constructed from different woods, it has colors of this tree and that spiral through the curve of the weapon, looking arboreally damascened. Truly the work of a master bowyer.

Military Cleaver.name: Military Cleaver
Military Cleaver.description: A large, sharpened metal blade designed to deal devastating blows.

Military Pick.name: Military Pick
Military Pick.description: A wooden shaft with a long and pointy metal head designed to puncture the sturdiest of armors.

Militia Spear.name: Militia Spear
Militia Spear.description: A simple wooden spear with a metal tip.

Morning Star.name: Morning Star
Morning Star.description: A wooden shaft with a spiked metal head used to deliver a combination of blunt-force and puncturing blows.

Noble Sword.name: Noble Sword
Noble Sword.description: A well-balanced long sword with a double-edged blade.

Obsidian Dagger.name: Obsidian Dagger
Obsidian Dagger.description: A hermit witch gave you this stone dagger after tempering it with your blood. Reflections in its glass seem to move on their own, but this is clearly a trick of the eye. Very curiously, however, blood never seems to dry if it rests upon the obsidian.

Head Splitter.name: Head Splitter
Head Splitter.description: A heavy piece of metal with a sharp head. Not made for human hands.

Man Splitter.name: Man Splitter
Man Splitter.description: A huge and crudely built double headed battleaxe too heavy to be used effectively by the average human.

Head Chopper.name: Head Chopper
Head Chopper.description: A sharp and crude shard of metal with a wrapped grip resembling a sword but a lot heavier. Not made for human hands.

Berserk Chain.name: Berserk Chain
Berserk Chain.description: A massive iron chain with a spiked full metal head at the end. Too heavy to be used effectively by the average human.

Bundle of Crude Javelins.name: Bundle of Crude Javelins
Bundle of Crude Javelins.description: A bunch of crudely made javelins intended for throwing at targets. Have limited range and are exhausting to throw, but may inflict devastating injuries. Can also inflict minor damage to shields if those are hit instead.

Cudgel.name: Cudgel
Cudgel.description: A massive wooden club studded with metal plates. Not made for human hands.

Tree Limb.name: Tree Limb
Tree Limb.description: A big and heavy branch torn from a tree. Not well suited for human hands.

Pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
Pickaxe.description: A hard head made from metal attached to a wooden handle, the Pickaxe is a miner's tool used to break up rocks. As an improvised weapon it's unwieldy but can deliver fatal injuries even through armor.

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description: A long pike used for thrusting over some distance and keeping the enemy at bay.

Pitchfork.name: Pitchfork
Pitchfork.description: An agricultural tool with a long handle and thick pointed tines used to lift and pitch straw. As an improvised weapon it can be used to keep an opponent at bay, but it won't inflict the deadliest of injuries and will perform poorly against armor.

Battle Standard.name: Battle Standard
Battle Standard.description: A company standard to take into battle. Held high, allies will rally around it with renewed resolve, and enemies will know well who is about to crush them.

Polehammer.name: Polehammer
Polehammer.description: A warhammer mounted on a long pole, used against armored targets over some distance and from behind the frontline.

Reinforced Wooden Flail.name: Reinforced Wooden Flail
Reinforced Wooden Flail.description: Two large sticks attached with a short chain and reinforced with metal, the Reinforced Wooden Flail is an agricultural tool turned weapon. A rather unpredictable one at that, but deadly enough to fell most men with a good hit to the head, and useful to strike over or around shield cover.

Rhomphaia.name: Rhomphaia
Rhomphaia.description: A long and curved blade, sharpened only on one side, on a large handle. Can be used both for quick slashes and sweeping strikes.

Rondel Dagger.name: Rondel Dagger
Rondel Dagger.description: A long, quadrangular spike designed to pierce through weakpoints in armor.

Rusty Warblade.name: Rusty Warblade
Rusty Warblade.description: A heavy blade with a curved end combining sword and axe into a devastating two-handed cleaver.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: An exotic curved sword from the south that is excellent for slashing, but not for thrusting or penetrating armor.

Scramasax.name: Scramasax
Scramasax.description: A long and heavy knife with a one sided blade used more for hacking than slashing.

Shamshir.name: Shamshir
Shamshir.description: This well-crafted exotic blade from the south has a curved edge that allows it to cut deep wounds with ease, but makes it less suited for thrusting and penetrating armor. A rare find in these lands.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: A short raw iron sword with some dents and notches, easy to wield in one hand.

Short Bow.name: Short Bow
Short Bow.description: A simple wooden short bow with medium range. Requires some expertise to use effectively.

Two-Handed Skull Hammer.name: Two-Handed Skull Hammer
Two-Handed Skull Hammer.description: A crude metal hammer used with two hands to crush both armor and its wearer alike.

Spetum.name: Spetum
Spetum.description: A cross between a spear and a pike, making for a good defensive weapon. Used for thrusting over some distance and keeping the enemy at bay.

Staff Sling.name: Staff Sling
Staff Sling.description: A leather sling on a staff, used to hurl stones at the enemy. With stones abundant everywhere, it will never run out of ammunition.

Thorned Whip.name: Thorned Whip
Thorned Whip.description: A sturdy thorned whip. Used by barbarians both in battle and to herd wild beasts, even the largest of which will flinch from its crack.

Three-Headed Flail.name: Three-Headed Flail
Three-Headed Flail.description: Three separate striking heads attached to a handle by chains. Each head can hit or miss a target separately and strike over or around shield cover.

Bundle of Throwing Axes.name: Bundle of Throwing Axes
Bundle of Throwing Axes.description: Small axes to be thrown in an overhand motion towards a target. Heavy enough to inflict serious damage to armor and shields from range.

Throwing Spear.name: Throwing Spear
Throwing Spear.description: Lighter than a common spear, but heavier than a javelin, this weapon is intended to be thrown over short distances. The tip will bend on impact, potentially rendering shields unusable. Can be used against unshielded opponents as well for great effect.

Two-handed Flail.name: Two-handed Flail
Two-handed Flail.description: A large and heavy metal flail that required two hands to use. Useful to strike over or around shield cover.

Two-Handed Flanged Mace.name: Two-Handed Flanged Mace
Two-Handed Flanged Mace.description: A large and heavy winged mace held with both hands. Receiving a blow from this weapon will leave anyone dazed and gasping for air, no matter their armor.

Two-Handed Hammer.name: Two-Handed Hammer
Two-Handed Hammer.description: A large and heavy hammer held with both hands. What it lacks in grace, it makes up for in raw force as it is used to shatter even heavily-armored enemy lines by knocking people away or to the ground.

Two-Handed Mace.name: Two-Handed Mace
Two-Handed Mace.description: A massive wooden club with a spiked head. Receiving a blow from this weapon will leave anyone dazed and gasping for air, no matter their armor.

Two-Handed Spiked Mace.name: Two-Handed Spiked Mace
Two-Handed Spiked Mace.description: A huge club fitted with a skull for good measure. Receiving a blow from this weapon will leave anyone dazed and gasping for air, no matter their armor.

Two-handed Wooden Flail.name: Two-handed Wooden Flail
Two-handed Wooden Flail.description: A heavy two-handed wooden flail that can strike over or around shield cover.

Two-Handed Mallet.name: Two-Handed Mallet
Two-Handed Mallet.description: A large wooden mallet that is held with both hands. Can deal devastating blows that may knock even armored enemies away or to the ground.

Warbrand.name: Warbrand
Warbrand.description: A two-handed variant of the sword with a long and thin blade, sharpened only on one side, and no crossguard. Can be used both for quick slashes and sweeping strikes.

Warfork.name: Warfork
Warfork.description: A pitchfork re-forged into a battlefield weapon that is a cross between a spear and a pike. Used for thrusting over some distance and keeping the enemy at bay.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: A short iron warhammer that easily batters through armor plates.

Warscythe.name: Warscythe
Warscythe.description: A long pole attached to a sharp curved blade, used to deliver deep sweeping strikes over some distance.

War Bow.name: War Bow
War Bow.description: A long bow with massive pulling power. Distinctively designed for battle.

Winged Mace.name: Winged Mace
Winged Mace.description: A full-metal mace with a short shaft and attached blades.

Wonky Bow.name: Wonky Bow
Wonky Bow.description: An ill-conceived bow if you ever saw one. The wood cricks and cracks when bent, the string frizzes and goes wiry every time you draw it back.

Woodcutter's Axe.name: Woodcutter's Axe
Woodcutter's Axe.description: A long, two-handed axe that bears down heavy with every swing. Held with both hands it is used to cut down large trees, but will cut down men just as well.

Wooden Flail.name: Wooden Flail
Wooden Flail.description: Two large sticks attached with a short chain, the Wooden Flail is an agricultural tool used to strike piles of grain to loosen the husks. As an improvised weapon it's rather unpredictable but useful to strike over or around shield cover.

Wooden Stick.name: Wooden Stick
Wooden Stick.description: A simple wooden stick, usually an improvised weapon.
